name: ibtech/couchdb Docker container
description: CouchDB with cors for automated build
readme:
[![](https://images.microbadger.com/badges/image/ibtech/couchdb.svg)](https://microbadger.com/images/ibtech/couchdb "Get your own image badge on microbadger.com")

# CouchDB - CORS
CouchDB with cors for automated build


# TODO
* Corrigir problema de permissÃ£o
dockerfile:
FROM couchdb:1.6

MAINTAINER tecnologia@ibtech.inf.br

RUN usermod -u 10100 couchdb \
 && groupmod -g 10100 couchdb \
 && sed -i 's/\[httpd\]/\[httpd\]\nenable_cors = true/g' /usr/local/etc/couchdb/local.ini \
 && printf "[cors]\ncredentials = true\nheaders = accept, authorization, content-type, origin, referer\nmethods = GET,PUT,POST,HEAD,DELETE\norigins = *\n" >> /usr/local/etc/couchdb/local.ini

run:
usermod -u 10100 couchdb  && groupmod -g 10100 couchdb  && sed -i 's/\[httpd\]/\[httpd\]
enable_cors = true/g' /usr/local/etc/couchdb/local.ini  && printf "[cors]
credentials = true
headers = accept, authorization, content-type, origin, referer
methods = GET,PUT,POST,HEAD,DELETE
origins = *
" >> /usr/local/etc/couchdb/local.ini
